title: Fang of the Sun Dougram
resume: Fang of the Sun Dougram is a 75-episode anime television series, created by Ryosuke Takahashi and Sunrise, and aired in Japan from October 23, 1981 to March 25, 1983 on TV Tokyo. A 1983 full-length feature film, Dougram: Documentary of the Fang of the Sun, summarized the series.

A 1983 full-length feature film, Dougram: Documentary of the Fang of the Sun, summarized the series.
